snippet.title: InoLab Trials – Official Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
🔗 Steam Page: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3205320/InoLab_Trials/
🔗 Discord channel: https://discord.gg/MB2Ee8f2Hs

Welcome to InoLab Trials! This is the official reveal trailer for our multiplayer co-op game, currently in early access and alpha stages. Developed by a solo indie developer, InoLab Trials is still heavily under development, with exciting new content planned.

In InoLab Trials, you and your friends take on a series of unique trials, each offering different gameplay mechanics and challenges. While the game is designed to feature multiple trials, the current alpha version includes two: Rise Up, a challenging platformer trial, and Maze Shift, a cooperative maze-solving experience.

As we continue to develop the game, your feedback and support mean the world to us! Add InoLab Trials to your Steam wishlist to stay updated on new releases, improvements, and additional trials.

🔗 Steam Page: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3205320/InoLab_Trials/
🔗 Discord channel: https://discord.gg/MB2Ee8f2Hs


BG Music: Superhero Trailer - Arct Sound - https://pixabay.com/users/arctsound-27113883/
